DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study compare effectiveness safety ABP 980 trastuzumab woman early breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study ABP 980 Compared With Trastuzumab Subjects With HER2 Positive Early Breast Cancer
